title: Michael Bennet
added: In February 2021, Bennet was one of seven Democratic U.S. Senators to join Republicans in blocking a ban of [[hydraulic fracturing]], commonly known as fracking.<ref>https://www.senate.gov/legislative/LIS/roll_call_lists/roll_call_vote_cfm.cfm?congress=117&session=1&vote=00028</ref>
